plot: Officer John Nolan is once again face-to-face with serial killer Rosalind Dyer. Officers Bradford and Chen work undercover with Detective Lopez and the Las Vegas Police Department to arrest leaders of a major criminal enterprise.

It's the day of serial killer Rosalind Dyer's trial, so LAPD assists the sheriff's department with transport court house security. A well-reputed attorney helps her overpower the deputy after demanding opportunity to change into civilian clothes and switch outfits, so she can escape during a fake fire alarm. Tim and Chen's 'pondered practice kiss' takes a backseat to their actual undercover, as the crooks change the rules last-minute, so Lopez wants to call it off, but Thorsen has a private jet available so the police can follow to Las Vegas, where the local PD is involved.—KGF Vissers
